topic.title: Issue with using window.localStorage
topic.body:
I have a ZeroNet site which needs to use window.localStorage, but the iframe the site loads into is preventing me due to 'allow-same-origin' not being present in the sandbox property. It seems I have no control over the iframe's properties because it gets injected by ZeroNet and not any files on my machine.

Anyone have a solution to this issue?

1_1DdVVtVGeYcTup7jnyMLLYwD3jjayPsu3M.body: It's too easy for you to say, "you're all wrong i'm from [pick a country not mentioned]", and not pay anyone.

8_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh.body:
Does anyone know of a decentralized cryptocurrency exchange on zeronet?
 Maybe someone could port Bisq to ZeroNet?
